sentences.sentence: This question I ask own innumerable, also replies own innumerably!
sentences.translation: 这个问题我问过自己无数遍，也回答过自己无数遍！

sentences.sentence: The girl has married, has gone to France, went time to appear innumerably in her dream Paris.
sentences.translation: 女孩结婚了，去了法国，去了无数次出现在她梦中的巴黎。

sentences.sentence: The same year, he commenced the writing of "The Confessions" with his innumerably bruised heart in lament and resentment.
sentences.translation: 同年，他怀着一颗悲愤的、伤痕累累的心，开始了《忏悔录》的写作。
